If there is only one apptab or tab left in the browser window, it can be closed from the Menu (File) through the "close tab" command if invoking the menu with the "alt+f" shortcut

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Firefox on a clean profile and have just one apptab or tab open
2. Use the shortcut key "ALT+F" to invoke Menu->File
3. Click on the "Close Tab" option
Actual Results:  
3. Browser window closes

Expected Results:  
3. A consistent behavior is expected as when right clicking on the last tab or apptab -> the "Close tab" option is grayed out (unavailable)

comments.raw_text:
The bug is an issue ever since 3.6.13 but was taken into consideration as a bug since the context menu (if only one tab or app tab left) does not allow the "close tab" option.

For further reading, please refer also to the comments in Bug 580638 (example Comment 55)
